title: Stereoscopiayer
description:
Stereoscopic Player description

                     Allows you to play stereoÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â­scopic videos and DVDs

The Stereoscopic Player application was designed to be a versatile 3D movie player. It allows you to play stereoÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â­scopic videos and DVDs (external decoder required) and also allows you to watch live video from a capture device.

Since it is based on DirectÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â­Show, it can handle almost any media format, for example AVI, MPEG, WMV and ASF. Videos can be coded in several different stereoÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â­scopic formats.

Why is it necessary to use a special software for 3D movie playback? The reason is that there are a lots of different ways to watch stereoscopic content as well as different ways to store the content.

In the past, it was necessary to encode a stereoscopic movie for each viewing method, for example you had to create an anaglyph file, a interlaced file for use with shutter glasses and a side-by-side for for free-viewing without glasses.

Quality was often very low, because most video codecs don't handle interlaced content well and subsample color information (reducing color resolution to quarter of original resolution), which reduces anaglyph quality dramatically.

Here are some key features of "Stereoscopic Player":

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Easy-to-use user interface
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports Video for Windows (*.avi), MPEG-1 (*.mpg), MPEG-2 (*.mpg, *.m2ts, *.mts, *.ts), MP4 (*.mp4), 3D Blu-ray files (*.ssif), Windows Media (*.wmv, *.asf), QuickTime (*.mov), Material Exchange Format (*.mxf), Matroska (*.mkv) and Flash (*.flv)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports photos in mpo, jpg, jps, tif, gif, png and bmp format
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports Windows Media Dual Stream files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports separate left/right files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports MXF files of Digital Cinema Packages (DCPs), including XYZ to RGB color space conversion
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Digital Rights Management (for stereoscopic Windows Media files only)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Playback of any other format supported by third party DirectShow decoders
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Windows Media 7.1 and 5.1 multichannel audio decoding
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Windows Media streaming
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 3D-DVD playback 1
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Live playback from capture devices (TV card, DV camcorder, ...)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Built-in video library stores settings for each movie
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Retrieves data from stereoscopic metadata servers
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Import and export of stereoscopic metafiles
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Command line control
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· OLE automation
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Compatible with Windows Media Center IR remote control
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Synchronized control of external effects via DMX512 (compatible with OpenDMX hardware), serial port and execution of programs and scripts.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· DXVA2-based GPU-accelerated video decoding
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supported languages

Requirements:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 1.5 GHz processor or better
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· DVD-ROM drive
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· DVD decoder
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· DirectX 9
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Sound card
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 3D hardware (3D glasses, 3D display, 3D projection system)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Dual core processor for 720p playback
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Quad core processor for 1080p playback
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Depending on the codec, a faster processor might be required
